text: Ivarkal pumiyil (oti tappittu allahvai) torkatikka mutiyatu. Allahvai tavirttu, ivarkalukku utavi ceypavarkalum illai. (Marumaiyilo) ivarkalukku vetanai irattippakkappatum. Ivarkal (tankal poramaiyin karanamaka nalla varttaikalaic) ceviyura caktiyarravarkal; (nerana valiyaik) kanavum mattarkal
